name: Bullet Art
description:
Create and Play bullet hell!

  • Very highly customizable bullet hell level editor.
  • Snap levels to a music to make it more interesting.
  • Load youtube video to stream music for the level.
  • Share levels using workshop in game.
  • Practice mode to play level from a specific point.
  • Replay mode to view your play.
  • Uses multithreading to calculate bullets.

and some experimental features..

Editor Feature
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2090154417

Creating Patterns
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2118425026

Create what you want
